content: GAAP revenues for the third quarter of 2022 were $5.8 million, a 4% increase from $5.6 million reported during the third quarter of 2021. On a per share basis, GAAP net loss from continuing operations was $0.71 per basic and diluted share compared to $1.57 per share during the third quarter of 2021. On a non-GAAP basis, Cyren's third quarter 2022 net loss was $5.5 million or a net loss of $0.70 per basic and diluted share as compared to a non-GAAP net loss of $4.7 million or $1.21 per share during the third quarter of 2021.
